Title: Relates to review of blood donations of patients with certain illnesses
Summary: Establishes that the council on human blood and transfusion services shall review all current medical research and guidance regarding the donation of blood by patients with a history of Lyme or tick-borne illnesses.
LawCode: Amd ยง3121, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to donation of blood by patients with a history of Lyme or tick-borne illnesses
